title: Roasted olives
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '1 clove garlic, peeled and crushed', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', '1 teaspoon dried chilli flakes', '1 teaspoon capers, drained', 'juice of 1 lemon', '80g green olives stuffed with pimento', '80g kalamata olives']
